function mint(address to, string memory _tokenURI, uint256 royaltyPercentage) public returns (uint256)
function batchMint(address to, string[] memory tokenURIs, uint256[] memory royaltyPercentages) public returns (uint256[] memory)
function getCreator(uint256 tokenId) public view returns (address)
function getRoyaltyInfo(uint256 tokenId) public view returns (address, uint256)
function calculateRoyalty(uint256 tokenId, uint256 salePrice) public view returns (uint256)
function updateRoyalty(uint256 tokenId, uint256 newRoyaltyPercentage) public
function ownerOf(uint256 tokenId) public view returns (address)
function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) public view returns (string memory)
function approve(address to, uint256 tokenId) public
function setApprovalForAll(address operator, bool approved) public
function isApprovedForAll(address owner, address operator) public view returns (bool)
event NFTMinted(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed creator, string tokenURI)
event RoyaltySet(uint256 indexed tokenId, uint256 royaltyPercentage)
